ModMetaData.name: Dynamic Diplomacy
ModMetaData.author: NilchEi
ModMetaData.description:
This mod allows several NPC faction related events which are processed automatically without any player input.
- NPC faction can become hostile or neutral to another NPC faction (permanently hostile factions excluded). - NPC settlements can be captured by another hostile NPC faction. - NPC factions can form alliance against dominant faction. - NPC factions with 0 settlements can rebel against their oppressors. - Can start the game with unique NPC relationships via 'Generate History' option in Scenario Settings.
For Ideology: - NPC factions can shift their ideology over time. - NPC factions can force inferior faction to adopt their ideology.
